resources.string:
Welcome to OpenFONMaps
 this app is still in development, if you have any comments write an email to info@androidmashup.org
 If you want to use the mashup! feature, you need to have at least another app installed with this feature. At the moment:
 - 'FONMaps'
 - 'Mashup-Panoramio'
 support the feature. Check out the 'Mashup-Organizer' for other apps to come. 'Mashup-Radar' or the regular 'Radar' work great when you want to navigate to a fonspot after clicking on it
 
 And finally a quick tip: Zooming also works with the volume buttons!
